title: What should my high school graduation quote be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Get ready. I’ve been compiling this list for atleast two years. . Sauron is not a giant glowing frisbee. - AnonymousI'm tired of you all , you're dismissed - Mr. DollPlay stupid games, win stupid prizes - unknownViolent use brings violent plans - Metallica (Sanatarium)Ask stupid questions, get stupid answers - unknownThis is a civilized ceremony - Mr. DollNothing makes a statement like a head on a pike. - Mr. GrohI thought it was a fart . . . it won't. - Coach JonesThe Holy Roman Empire was in no way holy, nor Roman, nor an empire. - Mr. Groh - VoltaireYeah, that's what I meant... there's no way I could mean anything other than that.....Well just 'cause an urn is for ashes, doesn't mean you can't put candy in it. - Coach JonesI know it looks like a roadcone, but i swear its a woman - Mr. Grohfake it till you make it - Coach Jonesno, its PATRICK. - Patrick from SpongebobI'm a goofy goober! - SpongebobAll men should try to learn before they die what they are running from, and to, and why.I hope you all have been having . . . a wonderful weekend. - Mr. DollWith great power comes great idiocy - Mr. GrohAnd the mongols . . . were the exception - John GreenYou're nothing but a baguette - Mr. GrohPotatoes are better mashed than distilled. - N.W.D.Too much stuff to do, not enough time - Mrs. WheelerSwastika? - Mr. LongAchacked- JoshDon't argue with idiots or you'll become one too - Mr. PaitI for one do not like nor agree with the changes, but I'm just a little teacher peasant who was not asked about it beforehand - Mr Long“Don't mistake my kindness for weakness. I am kind to everyone, but when someone is unkind to me, weak is not what you are going to remember about me.” - Al Caponescorch the world in the flames of your desire and then show them how the world is supposed to burn- anonymousDeath to the infidels - unattributed due to quoter blowing up in suicide attack.There are no accidents, only happy mistakes - Bob RossBabies in the front seat cause accidents, accidents in the back seat cause babies - anonymousNo, I am your father - Darth VaderIf you build it, he will come - Field of DreamsBelieve it- NarutoI can see darkness clearly now - SasaukeIt is not a sin to fight for the right cause - Android 16Do not go gentle into the good night, but rage, rage against the dying of the lightWhen do you think people die? It is when they are forgotten - One PieceForgiving is like a wound, it may heal, but there is always a scar - LuffyProtection from Invashers! - AP World History“Curiously, the only thing the bowl of petunias thought, as it fell, was, ‘Oh no. Not again.’ ” - HHGTTGwhat ever happens, happens - Spike SpiegelNo one ever expects the Spanish Inquisition - Monty PythonBeat the devil out of it - Bob RossThere's no more exhilarating feeling than being shot at without result - President Ronald Reagan“My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger.” —Billy Connolly, actorYou know there’s a problem when you realize that out of the three Rs, only one begins with an R.” —Dennis Miller, comedian“When you have bacon in your mouth, it doesn’t matter who’s president.” —Louis CK“I was going to sue for defamation of character, but then I realized I have no character.” —Charles Barkley, TV basketball analyst“Be careful about reading health books.  You may die of a misprint.” —Mark Twain“An optimist is someone who falls off the Empire State Building, and after 50 floors says, ‘So far so good!’” —Anonymous“He suffers from delusions of adequacy.” —Walter Kerr, criticToo much time, not enough stuff to do.... Wait reverse that! -Willy WonkaDisregard females, acquire currency."Education is the process of telling continually smaller lies."Theirs not to make reply, Theirs not to reason why, Theirs but to do & die.That feeling when you're so confused that you go onto a Biology for Kids website, despite being in AP Bio"Don't put anything stupid for your senior quote" - Mom"That's what" - SheNo i don't want a quote under my picture"If idiots could fly, this place would be an airport""Is mayonnaise an instrument" - Patrick StarAll your base are belong to us.Any pizza is a personal pizza if you believe in yourself.If it's and buts were candies and nuts, what a great christmas that would be."You've been watching for the last twelve hours straight, are you okay?" - NetflixBecause failure isn't an option if success is just a matter of more effort -W. Bruce CameronScrive for essellence.English is a hard language. It can be understood through tough thorough thought though

lol, I had the chance to do this, but it was past the deadline so I didn’t make it. I can tell you some of my classmates are unoriginal or just. . . showcasing the spirit of procrastination. 11:59 pm. Sent senior quote!11:59. . . (Okay. I admit I don’t remember all of the 11:59/last-minute senior quotes, but 1/10 of the quotes must of have been about the midnight deadline.)Quotes referencing twins. (Funny, yes, at first. But once you’ve seen one, it doesn’t get funnier.)I’ll take my senior picture later. (Said by someone who doesn’t have their senior pictures taken, lmao.)Now let’s get down to business. Here’s what I would have picked if I wanted to be. . . Pretentious: veni vidi vici (Admit it. There’s nothing like using dead Latin to be pretentious. Same goes for quotes in Latin. Or Shakespearean English.)^Any latin quoteAny quote from All the Places You’ll Go by Dr. Seuss. (Probably borderline cliche at this point.)Hip/Internet Acronyms: ur MCM’s my bae. <3 <3 <3 (No. . . I don’t even want to know or puzzle out your message. In ten years, I doubt you’ll remember what it even means.)Religious: Ruth 1:16-17 (Yes, I picked my favorite quote from the Bible. Don’t shoot me.)Bookish: (‘cuse me. I need to go and pull out my old Narnia books. This will take a while. . . Hmm. . . Can’t find them. But quotes come out from those books.)Only My Friends Know What I’m Talking About: Mmmm. . . Chocolate + Textbook + Math = Love + Keys. (Yes. . . I made this up. But I’m pretty sure I could reference something stupid me and my friends did.)Scarred by High School: We lived! We survived! (Yes. There is always one person.)Musical: (Not in the way you think.) High school without the musical. (Must be every year since that movie came out. . . Or maybe it’s just me.)But the high school quote is whatever you want it to be. It’s an expression of yourself and shows a hint of who you are. The photo itself can’t do that. Just make sure to keep it appropriate and remember. . . Whatever you say in the yearbook can’t be erased or unmade.
